    AppToolkit provides a set of Application related utility methods.

      • getApplicationDirectory

        public static java.io.File getApplicationDirectory(android.content.Context context)
        Gets application directory using the given Context.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        Returns:
        The directory as a File. If accessing the directory fails, null is returned.

      • getApplicationDirectoryPath

        public static java.lang.String getApplicationDirectoryPath(android.content.Context context)
        Gets application directory path using the given Context.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        Returns:
        The directory path as a String. If accessing the directory path fails, an empty String is returned.
